mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.student_id,a.description,a.attendance_date ,u.name FROM attendance a LEFT JOIN user u on a.student_id=u.id WHERE a.`status`=1 and u.`status`=1

select a.id,a.student_id,a.description,a.attendance_date,u.`name`,sc.class_name FROM attendance a LEFT JOIN t_attendance_class ac on a.id=ac.attendance_id LEFT JOIN student_class sc on sc.id=ac.class_id LEFT JOIN user u on a.student_id=u.id WHERE a.`status`=1 and sc.`status`=1 and u.`status`=1 and u.relationship=3 and sc.class_name=#{className}

SELECT a.id,a.student_id,a.description,a.attendance_date ,u.name FROM attendance a LEFT JOIN user u on a.student_id=u.id WHERE a.`status`=1 and u.`status`=1 and u.relationship=3 and u.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
